summary: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.
cast: Ali Suliman|Reymonde Amsallem|Evgenia Dodina|Dvir Benedek|Uri Gavriel|Ruba Salameh|Karim Saleh|Nisrin Siksik|Bassem Lulu|Ezra Dagan|Ramzi Maqdisi|Vladimir Friedman|Esther Zewko|Ehab Salami|David Gavish|Firas Khoury|Maher Slahat|Mohammed Nabulsi|Said Elnajar|Wisam Zoabi|Ben Levin|Elit Kraiz|Hilal Kaboub|Abdallah El Akal|Hamada Atallah|Hussein Yassin Mahazjne|Oren Balanga|Guy El Hanan|Khalil Hadad|Abu Mhmood|Yehuda Ben-Yehuda|Konstantin Sovkin|Arnon Tsabari|Asaf Levanon|Sergio Fried|Tzachi Vainzaft|Zvika Shamir|Anne Toledano|Ravid Aharon|Nathalie Rozanes|Dan Sluijzer|Arieh Worthalter|Luka Konikas|Thomas Feron|Louane Houben|Ofri Fuchs|Eli Gorenstein|Michael Warshaviak
title: El atentado
